threads: The real healthcare crisis isn't the cost, it's the government interference. Free market solutions, not price controls or single-payer systems, will bring affordability and quality care to all.
text: Ah, the free market fairy tale again. In your utopia, only the rich survive, eh? Healthcare is a right, not a commodity to be auctioned to the highest bidder. The government's role is to ensure it's accessible to all, not just your privileged friends.
